item.title: Click here to begin reading
item.description: Why should people bike? We all know that exercising is good for your body, and this also matter when it comes to biking. As noted by Statista, biking can help protect you from serious diseases such as stroke, heart attack, some cancers, depression, diabetes, obesity and arthritis- But even with the spectacular health benefits of biking, we only see that one percent of all trips that Americans take—to work, to the store, on vacation—are by bike, compared with 87 percent by car or truck.
